name: Kamikazo VR
description: From the maker of Dreamflight and Black Moon. Kamikazo, the new crazy motorbike race.
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP, Win7, Win8, Windows 10 Processor: I3 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2500 MB available space Sound Card: onboard Additional Notes: VR HMD
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7, Win8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2500 MB available space Sound Card: onboard Additional Notes: VR HMD
